trans-unit.source: Provides the base interface for creating <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于创建 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 实例的基接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate> interface defines the method that <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants must use to register with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate>接口定义的方法，<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>后代必须使用以将注册<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate> interface can be registered with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class and associated with a specific URI scheme so that the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> calls the class's <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create%2A> method when a URI that matches that scheme is requested.
trans-unit.target: 类实现<xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate>接口可以与注册<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类和的相关联的具有特定的 URI 方案因此<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>调用类的<xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create%2A>请求时某个 URI 匹配该方案的方法。

trans-unit.source: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the Web resource.
trans-unit.target: Web 资源的统一资源标识符 (URI)。
创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create%2A> method must return an initialized instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendant that is capable of performing a standard request/response transaction for the protocol without needing any protocol-specific fields modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create%2A>方法必须返回的初始化的实例<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>能够执行的协议的标准请求/响应事务，而无需修改任何特定于协议的字段的后代。

trans-unit.source: The request scheme specified in <paramref name="uri" /> is not supported by this <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" /> 实例不支持 <paramref name="uri" /> 中指定的请求方案。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />, instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI specified in <paramref name="uri" /> is not a valid URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> 中指定的 URI 不是有效的 URI。
